neu:sampleInfo.neu:title: ABIS Sample C#
neu:sampleInfo.neu:description: ABIS sample application demonstrates how to use SDK with biometrical systems that requires identifying fingerprints, palmprints, faces, irises or voice using server, cluster server functionality or identifying in the local database. It allows to enroll or match fingerprints, palmprints, face, iris images or voice (depending on SDK) within chosen database. Latent fingerprint editing, fingerprint slap segmentation is available in this sample. This sample demonstrates working with Accelerator too.
